text: Miya River may refer to: * Miya River (Mie), a major river in Mie Prefecture, Japan * Jinzū River, a major river in Gifu and Toyama prefectures that is often called the "Miya River" * Agano River, a river which flows from Fukushima Prefecture to Niigata Prefecture that is often called the "Miya River"
title: Miya River
